Package.Name: IoT Launch Pad
Package.Description: An IoT launch pad that consists of a data dashboard (GitHub fork) and Freeboard dashboard (NPM) auto-populated with emulated data or device data from IoT Ensemble APIs.

Basic.Name: IoT Launch Pad
Basic.Description: An IoT launch pad that consists of a data dashboard (GitHub fork) and Freeboard dashboard (NPM) auto-populated with emulated data or device data from IoT Ensemble APIs.
